summary: Code starts with a bash script, displays "no hello shit but screw you", refers to a composer (possibly referring to a music composer), states "no shit but screw you" twice, mentions writing a kernel and accepting the idea.

details.comment: Code starts with a bash script, displays "no hello shit but screw you", refers to a composer (possibly referring to a music composer), states "no shit but screw you" twice, mentions writing a kernel and accepting the idea.
details.content:
#!/bin/bash
echo "no hello shit but screw you"
# so that's our starting point. great composer?
echo "no shit but screw you"
echo echo
# fool man, i am the lego man.
# it is good to write a kernel. in fact, i fully accept the idea.
